sys_cb_topic.description: Example conversation to provide help with email issues.
sys_cb_topic.name: Issue Regarding Email

sys_update_version.name: sys_cb_topic_83a2453e87965550f7c50e1d0ebb3551
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><applicability_mode>query</applicability_mode><autopilot_topic>false</autopilot_topic><category>140e2eda0b203300a1b16c2367673af4</category><channels/><connect_queue/><description>Example conversation to provide help with email issues.</description><expose_on_palette>false</expose_on_palette><flexible_conversation_switching>false</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{
  "graph_api_version": "1.0.39",

        "72a979b67b4343c18f02f29bc730c00e": {
          "id": "72a979b67b4343c18f02f29bc730c00e",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Mail client is slow",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      return new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper().getRTEFormattedInstructions(gs.getMessage('Here are a few things you can try:'), [\n            gs.getMessage(\"Try closing and reopening your email client.\"),\n            gs.getMessage(\"If that doesn't solve the issue, try restarting your machine.\")\n      ]);\n})()\n\n\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "f70aa019ea904eceb3e06469f99e9ee2": {
          "id": "f70aa019ea904eceb3e06469f99e9ee2",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Which issue?"
        },
        "61c9ab02202b405f99c2df7de36150f7": {
          "id": "61c9ab02202b405f99c2df7de36150f7",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Can't receive email",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      return new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper().getRTEFormattedInstructions(gs.getMessage('Here are a few things you can try:'), [\n            gs.getMessage(\"Check with the person who is trying to send the email if it doesn't have any attachments that exceed {0} MB.\", vaVars.maxAttachmentSizeInMB.toString()),\n            gs.getMessage(\"If it doesn't, try closing and reopening your email client.\"),\n            gs.getMessage(\"If closing and reopening your email client doesn't work, try removing your account and adding it back again.\")\n      ]);\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "a9bb327ac42a40d2a44180ba4448a9c6": {
          "id": "a9bb327ac42a40d2a44180ba4448a9c6",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Can't send email",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      return new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper().getRTEFormattedInstructions(gs.getMessage('Here are a few things you can try:'), [\n            gs.getMessage(\"Check if the email you are trying to send doesn't have any attachments that exceed {0} MB.\", vaVars.maxAttachmentSizeInMB.toString()),\n            gs.getMessage(\"If it doesn't, try closing and reopening your email client.\"),\n            gs.getMessage(\"If closing and reopening your email client doesn't work, try removing your account and adding it back again.\")\n      ]);\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "ecd1ef919f46405eaded18f0a77a3b17": {
          "id": "ecd1ef919f46405eaded18f0a77a3b17",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Authentication issues",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n      return new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper().getRTEFormattedInstructions(gs.getMessage('Here are a few things you can try:'), [\n            gs.getMessage(\"Try closing and reopening your email client. You'll be asked for your username and password.\"),\n            gs.getMessage(\"If your username and password don't work, try resetting your password.\")\n      ]);\n})()",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },

        "1b3eb8b20ea6417f97c6bdb15ad37691": {

        "34548744fe1f4932a5e6470685b76b89": {
          "id": "34548744fe1f4932a5e6470685b76b89",

        "ae7a3d7439a543a08a75f867840ede81": {
          "id": "ae7a3d7439a543a08a75f867840ede81",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "KB results helpful?"
        },
        "431b5af2a5634a908922e594e7bc5f09": {
          "id": "431b5af2a5634a908922e594e7bc5f09",
          "name": "Check for outage",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_outage');\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('messageLIKEemail^ORcmdb_ciLIKEemail^end=NULL');\n    gr.addQuery('begin', '<=', new GlideDateTime().getValue());\n    gr.orderByDesc('begin');\n    gr.query();\n\n    if (gr.next()) {\n        vaVars.outageId = gr.getUniqueValue();\n        vaVars.outageCI = gr.getValue('cmdb_ci');\n        vaVars.outageSince = gr.getDisplayValue('begin');\n        vaVars.outageDetails = gr.getDisplayValue('details');\n        vaVars.outageCIDisplay = gr.getDisplayValue('cmdb_ci');\n    }\n\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "2931506fb9aa4f02b6ca46e254a7aabc": {
          "id": "2931506fb9aa4f02b6ca46e254a7aabc",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Is there an outage?"
        },
        "dd5a4eb09c8d4e2ca578214e0a6a862f": {
          "id": "dd5a4eb09c8d4e2ca578214e0a6a862f",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Outage Confirmation Message",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getMessage('I found there is a service disruption on the email service since {0}', vaVars.outageSince);\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "fc9d317d629b4c19a9e5f826b808ea43": {
          "id": "fc9d317d629b4c19a9e5f826b808ea43",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Show outage card",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    if (!vaVars.outageId)\n        return;\n\n    var card = [];\n    var baseURL = [];\n    var cardHeader = [];\n    baseURL.push(gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'));\n    baseURL.push('/');\n    baseURL.push(gs.getProperty('sn_itsm_va.com.snc.itsm.virtualagent.portal_url'));\n    baseURL.push('?id=service_status&service=');\n    baseURL.push(vaVars.outageCI);\n    cardHeader.push('[**');\n    cardHeader.push(gs.getMessage('Outage'));\n    cardHeader.push('** ](');\n    cardHeader.push(baseURL.join(''));\n    cardHeader.push(')');\n    card.push(cardHeader.join(''));\n    if (vaVars.outageCIDisplay) \n        card.push(gs.getMessage(\"**Service** : {0}\", vaVars.outageCIDisplay));\n\n    if (vaVars.outageSince) \n        card.push(gs.getMessage(\"**Begin** : {0}\", vaVars.outageSince));\n\n    if (vaVars.outageDetails) \n        card.push(gs.getMessage(\"**Details** : {0}\", vaVars.outageDetails));\n\n    return card.join('\\n');\n})()",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "7411d1649d6b47b2b003ad8721c49c1e": {

        "48a6ee457e4e4a99b4d8e91405b89236": {
          "id": "48a6ee457e4e4a99b4d8e91405b89236",
